channel.title: Can anyone recomend a base
channel.description:
i havn't really been on recently, jus so busy :\
anyways, i'm kinda bored atm so i thought that i'd just kill some time by running/coding a server for a while
sure i've done it before, but most clients i have are technically all finished i don't really like delta's source that he released because the folders arn't markedby "class.#" anyways, i was thinking i might just play around with devolution for a while if someone would be able to provide me with a link to a thred with a devo released source, then i'd apreaciate it, i can't realy find it in "search" option
anyways...
unless u can recomend some better source,
i don't want it to be entirly clean, but i don't really want any npc's around (but if they are, it's ok too..)
your help will be apreciated.
~WhiteWolf

item.title: Can anyone recomend a base
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

Your right on that. Believe me, if u use Delta, u will be sorry for your self lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone recomend a base
item.dc:creator: @Rage-Pk -Rage-Pk
item.description:
@Rage-Pk wrote:

Nope thats why I said prob. Most “bases” are horrible.

@ OP

Don’t use deltascape is all I can say.

Read full topic
